title: Yaarukkum Sollama Lyrics All In All Azhaguraja Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Yaarukkum Sollama
Singer(s): Rahul Nambiyar, Chorus
Movie: All In All Azhagu Raja
Music: Thamman S
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar

Yaarukkum Sollama,
un nenjukulla idam pidichen, unnaala thannaala
karanam illaama
un kannukulla sikki thavichen, munnaala pinnaala
manasukulla chellam vellam
konjam enna kavuthuputta mella saachiputta
thangam chellam vellam
hayyo enna thavikka vitta
nenja thudikkavitta
Yaaro nee yaaro pera sollidathaaney
kittathatta konnuputta

ye thottu thottu thottu
un nenja thottu thottu
indha kadhalum vandhu unnai otti ottikondhaa

vittu vittu vittu oru kaaichal vaithu vittu
indha kadhalin vetpam unnai
suttu suttu sendradhaa ..(Yaarukkum Sollama)

Un azhaga paathu manasa paathu
mayangi ponen naaney
adi kizhaka paarthu merka paarthu
thaniyaa nineney..
Un azhaga paathu manasa paathu
mayangi ponen naaney

Alaillaa kadala pola asayaama ninneney
karamela unna paarthu
dhesai maari vandheney
ennakulla enna thaedi
pudhusaaga pirandhenaa
yaaro nee yaaro un pera sollidathaaney
kittathatta konnuputta

Adi valayapatti thavilu saththam
manasukulla ketten, adhu
anga thatti inga thaati aatampodadhey
Adi valayapatti thavilu saththam
manasukulla ketten,
Mazha paenja tharaya pola
pudhu vaasam thandhaaye
puriyaadha vasam indha pen vaasam endraaye
thadaiyillaa minsaaram pol
dhinamdhorum vandhaaye
yaaro nee yaaro un pera sollidathaaney
kittathatta konnuputta
category: Song:Yaarukkum Sollama - All In All Azhaguraja
